id.description: The Flexport id used to refer to the product

sku.description: The SKU used to refer to the product

archived_at.description: If the product has been archived, the time it was archived. If the product is still active this will be null.

product_category.description: The category to group this product under

country_of_origin.description: The country the product was manufactured in

client_verified.description: Indicates whether Client has verified this Product.

product_properties.description: A user defined set of key-value objects to describe the product

hs_codes.description: DEPRECATED - HS codes can be found in the classifications array

_object.description: String representing the objectâ€™s type. Always `/hs_code` for this object.

description.description: Description of HS or HTS code classification.

code.description: 6 digit (international HS) or 10 digit (US HTS) code.

codes.description: An array of HS codes for this product in the provided region

region.description: The region for this classification. Currently only 2-character ISO codes and "EU" are supported
